entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
